divs: sighting detailsfollowed route 17 towards south glastonbury\portland, it was slow enough to pass in my car. seemed to be following something, crossed over highway twice,circled them it flew off. drone maybe?
Object Shape: Blimp, Circle, Cylinder, Oval, Star-like, Triangle, Other
Summary: Two small Unidentified Aircraft along route 17 in CT
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
